articles.title: Indian Hockey Coaches to Use Pro League Matches to Get Better Insights Ahead of CWG
articles.description: The Indian men's team is scheduled to play its next round of FIH Pro League matches against hosts Belgium (June 11 and June 12) and the Netherlands (June 18 and June 19), while the women's side will play Belgium (June 11 and June 12), Argentina (June 18 and June 19) and the United States (June 21 and June 22)
articles.content:
Eyes set on podium finishes at this year’s Birmingham Commonwealth Games, the Indian men’s and women’s hockey team coaches are looking at the upcoming FIH Pro League matches to gain better insights about the sides ahead of the multi-sport event.
The ... [2537 chars]

articles.title: No Stuart Hogg or Finn Russell as Scotland name tour squad for Chile & Argentina
articles.description: Gregor Townsend names a 40-strong squad for Scotland's summer tour to Chile and Argentina but Stuart Hogg and Finn Russell are omitted.
articles.content:
Last updated on .From the section Scottish Rugby
Gregor Townsend has left out captain Stuart Hogg for Scoltand's summer tour
Gregor Townsend has selected a 40-strong squad for Scotland's summer tour to Chile and Argentina.

articles.title: Canadian U18 squad bounced by Argentina 97-92
articles.description: Canada drops to 1-1 after falling to Argentina at FIBA U18 men’s Americas basketball championship tournament
articles.content:
Vasean Allette and Elijah Fisher both drained more than 20 points, but it wasn’t enough Tuesday as Argentina defeated Canada 97-92 in the second day of the FIBA U18 men’s Americas basketball championship tournament.
Four of the five Argentina starter... [798 chars]

articles.title: Argentina International Wants to Win the World Cup for Lionel Messi More Than Himself
articles.description: Argetina International Leandro Paredes reveals that he'll be happier for Lionel Messi more than himself if they win the World Cup in Qatar.
articles.content:
Published 06/07/2022, 3:48 PM EDT
Lionel Messi has proven that he is among the greatest players in the history of the sport. He has won every single trophy at club level, and his individual accomplishments speak for themselves. However, he hasn’t had... [2038 chars]
